item.title: Putin must 'prove he is serious about peace,' says Starmer
item.description: Sir Keir Starmer staged a show of unity with the Ukrainian president ahead of Friday's summit between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin.

item.title: Israeli settlement plans will 'bury' idea of Palestinian state, minister says
item.description: Far-right Israeli minister Bezalel Smotrich announced approval for 3,401 new homes in the controversial E1 area project in the occupied West Bank.

item.title: What do Putin and Trump each want from summit in Alaska?
item.description: The Russian leader senses a chance for more international recognition, while his American counterpart hopes to play peacemaker.

item.title: EU sending wildfire help to Spain as death toll rises
item.description: Spain has activated an EU disaster assistance mechanism for fires for the first time ever.

item.title: Dozens of migrants killed after boats capsize off Italian coast
item.description: More than 700 have died crossing the central Mediterranean in 2025, according to the UN reugee agency.
